items.id as items_id, items.no as items_no, items.name as items_name, items.cid1 as items_cid1, items.cid2 as items_cid2, items.is_online as items_is_online, items.src as items_src, items.thumb as items_thumb, items.place as items_place, items.summary as items_summary, items.notice as items_notice, items.description as items_description, items.created_at as items_created_at, items.updated_at as items_updated_at, items.deleted_at as items_deleted_at,
item_spec.id as item_spec_id, item_spec.gid as item_spec_gid, item_spec.is_remain as item_spec_is_remain, item_spec.is_online as item_spec_is_online, item_spec.is_active as item_spec_is_active, item_spec.is_rough as item_spec_is_rough, item_spec.is_promote as item_spec_is_promote, item_spec.is_delete as item_spec_is_delete, item_spec.status as item_spec_status, item_spec.sort as item_spec_sort, item_spec.weight as item_spec_weight, item_spec.min as item_spec_min, item_spec.max as item_spec_max, item_spec.market_price as item_spec_market_price, item_spec.shop_price as item_spec_shop_price, item_spec.promote_price as item_spec_promote_price, item_spec.remain as item_spec_remain, item_spec.sale_num as item_spec_sale_num, item_spec.quanlity as item_spec_quanlity, item_spec.unit as item_spec_unit, item_spec.unit_sell as item_spec_unit_sell, item_spec.unit_desc as item_spec_unit_desc, item_spec.created_at as item_spec_created_at, item_spec.updated_at as item_spec_updated_at, item_spec.deleted_at as item_spec_deleted_at
